TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TransactionFlowBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension
Public NotInheritable Class TransactionFlowBindingElement Inherits BindingElement Implements IPolicyExportExtension

summary.span: 表示指定繫結程序之異動流程支援的組態項目。

span.span: Represents the configuration element that specifies transaction flow support for a binding.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個項目可以讓您啟用或停用端點繫結程序設定的傳入異動流程，以及指定傳入異動的所需通訊協定格式。This element allows you to enable or disable incoming transaction flow in an endpoint’s binding settings, as well as to specify the desired protocol format for incoming transactions. > [!CAUTION] > 當使用 通訊協定在端點之間流動交易時，如果目的端點嘗試使用任何 以外的通訊協定再次流動時，交易逾時可能會遺失。When using the protocol to flow transactions from endpoint to endpoint, the transaction timeout can be lost if the destination endpoint attempts to flow again using any protocol other than . 這會導致 躍點後的所有下層節點比預期的時間更晚發生逾時。This can cause all down-level nodes after the hop to timeout later than expected.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified protocol that is used to flow a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 選擇的通訊協定使用，請參閱[啟用交易流程](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/31a6bc6a-4ef4-45ba-a753-1efa1a19d917)。 choosing the protocol to be used, see [Enabling Transaction Flow](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/31a6bc6a-4ef4-45ba-a753-1efa1a19d917).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立能夠用來建立指定型別之傳出通道的通道處理站。This method creates a channel factory that can be used to make outgoing channels of the specified type. 建置通道堆疊時，基礎結構會呼叫這個方法。This method is called by the infrastructure when building the channel stack. 只有在實作自訂繫結項目時才應該在程式碼中使用這個方法。You should use it in your code only when you implement a custom binding element.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 無法建置指定通道型別的通道處理站。

span.span: A channel factory for the specified channel type cannot be built.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立接收此繫結之訊息的通道接聽程式。This method creates a channel listener to receive messages for this binding. 建置通道時，基礎結構會呼叫這個方法。This method is called by the infrastructure when building the channel. 只有在實作自訂繫結項目時才應該在程式碼中使用這個方法。You should use it in your code only when you implement a custom binding element.

exception.span: 無法建置指定通道類型的通道接聽程式。

span.span: if a channel factory for the specified type of channel can be built from ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在嘗試實際建置處理站之前，您應該呼叫這個方法檢查是否能夠建置指定 `TChannel` 之 `context` 類型通道的通道處理站。You should call this method to check that the channel factory for channels of type `TChannel` can be built for the specified `context`, before attempting to actually build the factory. 請注意，如果無法建置指定通道型別的通道處理站， 就會擲回例外狀況。Note that throws an exception if it cannot build a channel factory for the specified channel type.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Clone () As BindingElement
public: override System::ServiceModel::Channels::BindingElement ^ Clone();

span.span: Creates a duplicate of this element.
A that is a duplicate of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立此繫結項目的深層複製。This method creates a deep clone of this binding element. 物件的深層複製會建立物件的複本，以及該物件直接或間接參考之每個物件的複本，A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. (這也稱為複製整個物件圖形)。相較之下，物件的淺層複製則只是物件的複本。(This is also called copying the entire object graph.) A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果物件包含其他物件的參考，則淺層複製不會建立所參考之物件的複本，而只會複製原始物件的參考。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public override T GetProperty<T> (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) where T : class;
.method public hidebysig virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) (context As BindingContext) As T

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 此方法正在查詢的型別物件。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.

param.name: context

span.span: The

param.span: 應該用來取得要求的屬性。

span.span: that should be used to get the requested property.

summary.span: 從繫結堆疊的適當層次中，取得要求的型別物件 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Gets the typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the binding stack.

returns.span: 要求的型別物件 (如果有的話)，如果不存在則為 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present; if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法從繫結程序項目堆疊擷取功能、需求與參數。You can use this method to retrieve capabilities, requirements and parameters from the binding element stack. 如果某個繫結項目支援傳回要求的物件，它就會傳回物件。If a binding element supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支援，則會將該呼叫向下委派到堆疊中的下一個繫結項目。If not, it delegates the call down to the next binding element in the stack. 如果到達堆疊的底部，而且沒有任何繫結項目支援要求的物件，這個方法會傳回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no binding element supported the requested object, this method returns `null`.

span.span: is .
